title: Today  Impossible  Question  – Weekday Mornings with Todd E . Lyons , Esquire on 105 . 7 The Hawk – The Hawk Yakima
body_text:
Are you the smartest person listening to The Hawk?
Find out every morning @ 7:40 with Todd E. Lyons, Esquire as he poses “Today’s ‘Impossible’ Question” powered by: Yakima Federal Savings & Loan!
Today's Question: (7/18/25) A study found the more education you receive in life, the larger your ___________ will be. What?
(7/1/25) When asked what they wanted to be when they grew up, 70% of elementary school boys said they would rather be a ___________ than the President of the USA. What?
Answer: bartender
(6/30/25) The most popular Google search for people ages 55 and over is "how to ___________" followed closely by how to play pickleball. What is it?
Answer: retire
(6/27/25) In another survey, when women were asked what food reminds them of their husband, one third (1/3) of them said ___________. What?
Answer: a potato
(6/26/25) The average American spends 2 hours and 50 minutes doing this every weekend. What is it?
Answer: working unpaid
(6/25/25) In a recent survey, men said that the cellphone is the best "gadget" ever invented while women chose the ___________. What?
Answer: hair straightener
(6/24/25) If you do this, you'll be 50% happier in your life. What is it?
Answer: be spontaneous
(6/23/25) 43% of women, in a recent survey, say they find it very attractive when a potential love interest knows how to ___________. What?
Answer: iron clothes
(6/20/25) Another survey says that the average woman secretly likes ___________. What?
Answer: vacuuming
(6/18/25) A recent survey says that the main things we feel guilty about throwing away are gifts, family heirlooms, clothes we don't wear and ___________. What?
Answer: greeting cards
(6/17/25) Millions of people between the ages of 25-34 say they always call someone to help them with this task. What?
Answer: hang a picture
(6/16/25) A poll found that kids only listen to about 50% of the time when parents talk about ___________. What?
Answer: finances
(6/12/25) A study says that the most important factor to having a fulfilled life is having a ___________. What?
Answer: a job you like
(6/10/25) 56% of people will not date someone who isn't good at ___________. What?
Answer: driving a car
(6/9/25) 14% of adults say they've had a drink, or two, before going to ___________. What?
Answer: the dentist
(6/6/25) More than half of American men say that their least favorite thing to shop for is ___________. What?
Answer: furniture
(6/5/25) A study found that the #1 thing that annoys us while we are out shopping is ___________. What?
Answer: slow walkers
(6/4/25) About 1/3rd of homes have a ___________, and it's almost always in the closet. What?
Answer: Scrabble board game
(6/3/25) The #3 best summer job for teenagers is ___________. What?
Answer: tutoring
(6/2/25) When researchers asked, "What is the number one rule in your house?" The number one answer was "___________". What?
Answer: no feet/shoes on the furniture
(5/30/25) One in three wives wish their husbands would ___________ more. What?
Answer: hold hands
(5/28/25) 29% of people do not know their partner's favorite ___________. What?
Answer: salad dressing
(5/27/25) The average person will say this two-word phrase 9,000 times in their life. What?
Answer: "I'm fine"
(5/23/25) Women take 20 seconds longer than men to ___________. What?
Answer: parallel park
(5/21/25) 35% of people say that one of the worst things you can do while on a dinner date is ___________. What?
Answer: blow your nose
(5/20/25) Most women (around 82%) agree that men over 30 should never wear ___________. What?
Answer: earrings
(5/19/25) Around 31% of us believe we've landed a job (in part) because we were wearing ___________. What?
Answer: lucky underwear
(5/16/25) The average person fantasizes about ___________ 818 times a year. What?
Answer: vacationing
(5/15/25) Just 6% of Americans can say they've never owned ___________. What?
Answer: a pet
(5/14/25) 25% of us blame a co-worker for our addiction to ___________. What?
Answer: chocolate
(5/13/25) What is the #2 thing people exaggerate the most about?
Answer: traveling
(5/12/25) Americans throw away 26 million___________ per day. What?
Answer: batteries
(5/9/25) Married couples fight after ___________ 45% of the time. What?
Answer: going to a party
(5/8/25) Three in ten parents use their kids as an excuse to buy ___________. What?
Answer: chocolate milk
(5/5/25) The most common recurring dreams are #1) falling, #2) being chased and #3) ___________. What?
Answer: being back in school
(5/2/25) 38% of people say that ___________ brings them instant happiness. What?
Answer: hugging someone
(5/1/25) A little over 50% of women say they ___________ much better than their husband. What?
Answer: mow the lawn
(4/30/25) A new poll found that teenaged boys AND girls both agree on THIS when it comes to the question, "What is most important in life?" What is it?
Answer: a job/career that makes them happy
(4/29/25) 30% of us admit we've done THIS at work. What is it?
Answer: look through a co-worker's desk
(4/28/25) When asked, "What superstition do you believe in," 19% of people said ___________. What?
Answer: bad things happen in 3s
(4/25/25) 32% of parents say that the most difficult thing they encountered when they became a parent is ___________.
Answer: potty training
(4/24/25) Only 8% of people say they can't remember their first ___________. What?
Answer: concert
(4/23/25) Nearly 400 ___________ have been left behind on a plane in the past year. What?
Answer: wedding rings
(4/22/25) 20% of workers say that ___________ in the work place makes them less productive. What?
Answer: the temperature
(4/21/25) 40% of couples married 15 years or more said this statement was a turn on? "You're a ___________." What?
Answer: great cook
(4/18/25) 16% of apprehended shoplifters have stolen this item. What is it?
Answer: energy drinks
(4/17/25) The average woman keeps the same ___________ for 12 years. What?
Answer: hair stylist
(4/16/25) 26% of people have told this lie while visiting a friend's home. What is it?
Answer: the coffee tastes great
(4/15/25) In 1972, over 70% of homes in America had ___________ in it. Today, about 18% have one. What?
Answer: an ash tray
(4/14/25) According to Men's Health, 40% of men can not remember the last time they wrote ___________. What?
(4/11/25) One fourth (1/4th) of adults say that their favorite smell is ___________. What?
Answer: camp fire
(4/10/25) The first thing most people think about every day is ___________. What?
Answer: sleep
(4/9/25) The number one thing we find attractive in a partner when we're younger is their looks, but after the age of 50 it's ___________. What?
Answer: kindness
(4/8/25) 28% of people who received a raise at work say it was because they did this. What?
Answer: bragging about the company on social media
(4/7/25) The average person will ___________ five (5) times in their lifetime. What?
Answer: lock themselves out of their car
(4/4/25) According to a travel magazine, 21% of Americans would like to take their family on a vacation to ___________. Where?
Answer: the moon
(4/3/25) You probably have 150 ___________ at home but you only ever use about 15 of them. What?
Answer: TV channels
(4/1/25) A study suggests that if you have a ___________, you could live 8 to 10 years longer than other people. What?
Answer: sense of humor
(3/31/25) This odd trick can make you appear more confident in a conversation. What is it?
Answer: blinking slowly
(3/27/25) The top 3 most hated foods in America are tofu, liver and ___________. What?
Answer: anchovies
(3/26/25) 93% of people can identify this smell in one second. What is it?
Answer: peanut butter
(3/25/25) After paying taxes, people say ___________ was the second most stressful thing in their lives. What?
Answer: family
(3/24/25) Research shows that doing this while shopping can make you spend more money. What?
Answer: holding a warm drink
(3/21/25) 19% of people in this profession go commando (don't wear underwear). What is it?
Answer: bartenders
(3/20/25) The #1 thing we do out of habit is sleep on the same side of the bed. What comes in at #2?
Answer: sit in same spot on the couch
(3/19/25) It is projected that it will cost Americans at least $250 million this year due to injuries related to ___________. What?
Answer: pickleball
(3/18/25) According to restaurant food delivery folk, the worst tippers work in what profession?
Answer: hair salons
(3/17/25) 300,000 of these are borrowed each year and never returned. What?
Answer: bicycles
(3/11/25) 14% of drivers say the worst thing about their vehicle is ___________. What?
Answer: monthly payment
(3/10/25) One out of four people wish they could get into this morning habit. What is it?
Answer: making their own coffee
(3/7/25) 34% of people who fail their driving test fail for THIS reason. What?
Answer: they were nervous
(3/5/25) 40% of women say they break out in a sweat, the minute they have to ___________. What?
Answer: parallel park
(3/4/25) 48% of people have lied to their friend about their ability to help them ___________. What?
Answer: moving
(3/3/25) A survey says that the most disliked household chore is ___________. What?
Answer: cleaning the bathroom
(2/28/25) Every month, more than 5,000 people go on Google and search for "How do I ___________?" What?
Answer: use Google
(2/27/25) A study found that left-handed people are three times more likely to do this than right-handed people. What is it?
Answer: show up late
(2/26/25) 20% of men only wash this once a month. What is it?
Answer: cell phone
(2/25/25) 14% of people say ___________ is the most underappreciated job. What is it?
Answer: sales person
(2/24/25) 17% of restaurant servers say they hate it when you ___________. What?
Answer: claim a table before it has been cleared off
(2/20/25) If you are average, you'll own 155 ___________ in your lifetime. What?
Answer: toothbrushes
(2/19/25) Research shows that many women worry that their ___________ will give away their real age. What?
Answer: hands
(2/18/25) If you like rock music and watched "Seinfeld," you're less likely to ___________ in the morning. What?
Answer: make your bed
(2/14/25) 60% of men say they get turned off when they see a woman ___________. What?
Answer: take a selfie
(2/13/25) The #1 parents' saying that kids hate to hear the most is "___________". What is it?
Answer: money doesn't grow on trees
(2/12/25) The #1 thing that people get carpet stains from is ___________. What?
Answer: red wine
(2/11/25) According to people ages 30 and up, ___________ is the second most stressful thing in their life. What?
Answer: visiting family
(2/7/25) 71% of married men say they never let their wife near the ___________. What?
Answer: Grill
(2/6/25) 29% of women have tried to enhance their appearance by ___________. What?
Answer: stuffing their bra
(2/5/25) Phone chargers are the most common thing left behind in hotel rooms. ___________ is the second most. What is it?
Answer: underwear
(2/4/25) The average man uses two ___________ while the average woman uses four of them. What?
Answer: pillows
(2/3/25) More than 50% of employees say they don't have one of these at work. What is it?
Answer: a friend
(1/31/25) Women think about ___________ around 5 times per day, while men think about it every other day. What?
Answer: grocery shopping
(1/30/25) 84% of Americans are worried that their homes are not ___________. What?
Answer: clean
(1/29/25) According to a survey in a woman's magazine, 7 out of 10 women won't date a guy who has ___________. What?
Answer: gray hair
(1/28/25) 15% of Americans wish they could ___________. What?
Answer: read minds
(1/27/25) Over 75% of people own ___________, but less than half of them actually work? What is it?
Answer: a flashlight
(1/24/25) A study found, when meeting someone new, the first two things people judge are the other person's teeth and their ___________. What?
(1/23/25) One out of every nine Americans have worked at a ___________. What/where?
Answer: convenience store
(1/22/25) The most likely thing a kid will stick up their nose is ___________. What?
Answer: a color crayon
(1/21/25) Once you hit the age of 80, you will live longer if you have ___________. What?
Answer: a job
(1/20/25) According to a recent survey, the beach was the #1 place most people would most like to live. Coming in at #2 is ___________. What?
Answer: a small town
(1/17/25) Over 90% of American households will buy a ___________ every week. What?
Answer: pie
(1/16/25) A survey found ___________ to be the most annoying sound in the workplace. What is it?
Answer: sniffling
(1/15/24) 37% of men say that they would like to purchase a ___________ before they die. What?
Answer: Ford Mustang
(1/14/25) 38% of Americans realize that they are out of shape when they attempt ___________. What?
Answer: Bring in the groceries
(1/13/25) 19% of people say that the most annoying sound is ___________. What?
Answer: clearing your throat
(1/10/25) 12% of adults do not own a ___________. What is it?
Answer: credit card
(1/9/25) Every year, 2000 people go to the Emergency Room because of ___________. What?
Answer: pizza
(1/8/25) The average person spends 5 1/2 months of their life waiting for ___________. What?
Answer: a web page or video to load
(1/7/25) 32% of people believe they got their job because of this? What?
(1/6/25) The U.S. has more than 10,000 millionaires that made their money and got rich by ___________. What?
Answer: playing video games
(12/20/24) 38% of us plan to visit ___________ on our Summer vacation this year.
(12/19/24) The average person buys a new ___________ every 3 years. What?
(12/17/24) Half of all dog owners say that their dog loves to ___________. What?
Answer: watch t.v.
(12/16/24) It takes the average person 8 seconds to ___________. What?
(12/12/24) We throw away about 20% of ___________ before going to buy more. What?
Answer: toothpaste
(12/11/24) When it comes to money, about 20% of us have consulted ___________ to help make a financial decision. Who/What?
Answer: our horoscope
(12/10/24) 12% of us never use ___________ even though we've already paid for it. What is it?
Answer: prescription drugs
(12/9/24) More than 2 out of every 5 air travelers want ___________ banned on airplanes. What is it?
Answer: reclining seats
(12/6/24) 18% of women have bought ___________ for a man when they don't know what to get him. What is it?
(12/4/24) Around 1/3rd of people say that the only thing they love about their job is ___________. What?
(12/3/24) Nearly 80% married couples don't trust their spouse to ___________. What?
Answer: wake them up
(12/2/24) If you were born between 1981 and 1996 you are a "Millenial" and 68% of you do not own ___________. What?
Answer: a toaster
(11/27/24) Tying your shoes is the hardest thing to teach your child. Coming in second place is teaching them how to ___________. What?
(11/26/24) A little less than 10% of people admit that one of their favorite things to do after having a bad day is eating ___________. What?
(11/25/24) 11% of adults say that they have smoked weed while at ___________. Where?
Answer: McDonald's
(11/22/24) The #3 most-hated invention that we say we can't live without is ___________. What?
Answer: alarm clock
(11/20/24) A recent survey found that women should stop wearing ___________ at age 51. What?
Answer: high-heeled shoes
(11/19/24) The #1 thing in our homes that people say we have too many of is ___________. What?
(11/18/24) Close to 18% of women say that they pray before they ___________. What?
Answer: step on the scale
(11/15/24) 68% of women say that they feel guilty if they ___________ before going to work. What?
Answer: leave dirty dishes in the sink
(11/13/24) A waiter or waitress can expect to make 20% more in tips if they wear ___________. What?
Answer: red
(11/12/24) 8% of people said that ___________ ruins a salad. What?
Answer: cabbage
(11/11/24) 1 in 5 adults say that they are too afraid to clean ___________ in their home. What?
Answer: refridgerator
(11/7/24) 3,000 people a year wind-up in the Emergency Room after tripping over ___________. What?
Answer: laundry basket
(11/6/24) A survey revealed that the most annoying phrase used in work meetings is "___________". What?
Answer:
(11/5/24) Nearly half of women purchase ___________ when they are feeling down. What?
Answer:
(11/1/24) 2 out of 5 adults say that they are embarrassed by their ___________ and blame their parents for it. What?
Answer: middle name
(10/31/24) When talking with other guys, approximately 20% of men refer to their wife by the name ___________. What?
Answer: the boss
(10/30/24) 3 out of 5 women over the age of 35 years say that the biggest compliment they can get is when someone tells them ___________. What?
Answer: they look younger than what they actually are
(10/28/24) 82% of women say that a guy over age 30 should never wear ___________. What?
Answer: an earring
(10/25/24) By the age of 5, 70% of our kids know how to use a computer mouse but only 10% of them know how to ___________. What?
Answer: tie their shoes
(10/24/24) A study shows that - compared to their mothers - women today have much bigger ___________. What?
Answer: engagement rings
(10/23/24) The top 2 things that women say that they like to splurge on are flowers and ___________. What?
Answer: jeans
(10/21/24) A poll found that kids only listen about 50% of the time when their parents talk about ___________. What?
Answer: finances
(10/18/24) Millenials are nearly 20% more successful at ___________ than their parent. What is it?
Answer: staying married

(10/16/24) 35% of men have tried to hide ___________ from their mother. What?
Answer: motorcycle
(10/15/24) 56% of people say that they will NOT date someone who is not good at ___________. What?
Answer: driving
(10/14/24) 36% of drivers say that the most important thing to keep in your car is ___________. What?
(10/11/24) 2 out of 5 married men say that their wives are ___________ and that they don't like it. What is it?
(10/10/24) 12% of women claim that they ended a date prematurely because the guy ___________. What?
Answer: cursed/swore/used profanity too much
(10/9/24) While ice cream is the most popular dessert, ____________ is #2. What is it?
Answer: Jell-O
(10/8/24) If you are an average person, you have 725 of these. What are they?
Answer: phone contacts
(10/7/24) The #1 thing that women say that they can NOT live without is the internet.
What is the #2 thing?
Answer: cuddling
(10/4/24) Slightly more than 1/4 of people say that they just have ___________ for breakfast. What?
Answer: soda pop
(10/3/24) More than 50% of workers polled said that they wish their workplace would upgrade ___________. What?
Answer: the coffee
(10/2/24) In the U.S. each year, 4,500 people injure themselves with this common utensil. What is it?
Answer: a pencil
(10/1/24) Nearly 1 out of 4 people say that comments from their kids inspire them to ___________. What?
Answer: lose weight
(9/27/24) The #1 thing adults forget the most is where they put their keys. Number 2 is ___________. What?
Answer: what they need at the store/grocery list

Answer: time with husband

Answer: pickles

Answer: birds/birdwatching

Answer: lima beans

Answer: yell at other drivers

Answer: drink straight out of the carton/jug

Answer: land a plane

Answer: pumpkin

Answer: music in the office

Answer: tight/enclosed spaces (claustrophobia)
(9/11/24) 29% of Americans say that their favorite thing about Fall is ___________. What?
(9/10/24) The most common recurring dreams include: #1 - falling, #2 - being chased and #3 - ___________. What?
(9/9/24) 38% of people say that doing this brings them instant happiness. What is it?
(9/6/24) A little over 50% of women say they do ___________ much better than their husband. What is it?
Answer: mow the lawn

Answer: a rose

Answer: macaroni & cheese

Answer: ATM

Answer: lose/can't find their car keys
(8/28/24) 31 years-old is the average age that people stop doing what?
Answer: having a birthday party
(8/27/24) You are more likely to get stung by a bee if you are eating ___________. What?
(8/26/24) People that sleep on their left side are more likely to be ___________. What?
Answer: creative
(8/23/24) 15% of us have not washed our ___________ in the past 6 months. What?
Answer: bathrobe
(8/22/24) 12% of people still have ___________ from their elementary school days. What is it?
Answer: a best friend

Answer: exercise

Answer: good first name
(8/19/24) A study has determined that we spend 5 years of our lives feeling ___________. What?
Answer: bored

Answer: horse racing

Answer: check the mail

Answer: soap in the bathroom

Answer: a wife

Answer: take a cold shower

Answer: wallet

Answer: blonde hair

Answer: cockroach

Answer: quitting their job

Answer: cleaning the oven

Answer: having family come visit from out of town for the holidays

Answer: "I'm tired"
(7/15/24) Slightly over 3/4ths of women say that the thing they regret most about their high school years is ___________. What?

(7/11/24) 3/4ths of women say that they are turned off when they see a dad who wears ___________. What?

(7/10/24) Slightly more than half of all Americans wish that they were ___________. What?

(7/9/24) The average woman secretly likes to ___________. What?

Answer: greeting cards

Answer: shopping

Answer: my clothes

Answer: a coffee shop
(6/26/24) 1 out of 10 married couples say that they met each other at ___________. What?
Answer: the gym
(6/25/24) More than 50% of men in the U.S. say that their least favorite thing to go shopping for is ___________. What?
Answer: furniture
(6/24/24) The #1 thing that annoys us while we are out shopping is when other people ___________. What?
Answer: walk slowly
(6/21/24) Approximately 33% of homes have a ___________ and it's almost always in the closet. What is it?
Answer: Scrabble board game
